== Ubuntu Users and Members ==

'''Contents'''
=== What is this? ===
This is the idea of create a launchpad.net teams for regular users owned by the Community Council, I think all the Ubuntu users should have a team where they can tell ''hey I'm here, my name is Robert Paulsen! and I'm user of Ubuntu'' this team should be the '''<nowiki>[[http://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-users|ubuntu-users]]</nowiki>'''('''<nowiki>[[http://launchpad.net/~kubuntu-users|kubuntu-users]]</nowiki>''', '''<nowiki>[[http://launchpad.net/~edubuntu-users|edubuntu-users]]</nowiki>''', '''<nowiki>[[http://launchpad.net/~xubuntu-users|xubuntu-users]]</nowiki>''').

The Kubuntu, Edubuntu and Xubuntu teams will be a subteam of the Ubuntu Team (users and members)

I create a icons for all the teams and a nice drawing (this is just a concept).

At this time I'm the owner of the ubuntu-users and edubuntu-users but I'll be happy to change the ownership to the Community Council.

This are my 0.4 pesos.

<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/mayeco|Mario Young]]</nowiki>
